sentence.idiomatic: I want to try your specialty dish.
This is our specialty dish.
What specialty dish do you have?
We'll have lobster tonight.
She really likes lobster.
The lobster here is very famous.
Once I accidentally became their third wheel.
No one likes being a third wheel.
I don't want to be your third wheel.
She's always complaining that you put your relationship before your friendships.
A lot of people value love over friendship.
Friends all say she puts her boyfriend before her friends.
I'm not afraid of anything when you're keeping me company.
No one kept him company today.
I keep my grandmother company.
Thanks to everyone's support, he was a success today.
Thanks to your help, we were finally able to complete the work.
Thanks to your help, the program went really well.
Don't complain all the time.
He keeps complaining about his horrible job.
After being informed to work overtime, everyone is complaining.
Do you have to work overtime?
We don't need to work overtime today.
He has to work overtime today.
People feel bad about this child's unfortunate experience.
All parents love their children.
People should learn to love themselves.
Why do you get so angry?
She got quite angry today.
He is really angry right now.
I’m so sorry we’re late. Zhang Liang had to work overtime. He’s really busy.
Hi, you must be Chen Jing. It’s a pleasure to meet you. I’m really sorry. Today it’s my treat.
Oh, you are so busy. I’m always hearing Lili complaining about it.
Yeah, can't do anything about it. Luckily, Lili have you as a good friend. You can keep each other company.
Exactly. Jing Jing and I have been together since kindergarten. She’s my best friend. Shall we order?
You still have the nerve to say that? You value your new boyfriend over an old friend. Now that you have Zhang Liang, you’ve totally forgotten about me.
That’s totally not true! I can attest to the fact that Lili thinks about you every day. Whenever we go somewhere fun or eat something good, she always says she wants to take you there too.
I don’t want to be a third wheel. Let’s order the lobster! I’ve heard that it’s the specialty dish here.
Aren’t you on a diet? Zhang Liang, you’re the best at ordering. You order.
Lili, how can you act like such a housewife? You just care about saving Zhang Liang's money.
Hey, Chen Jing is so thin, she really doesn’t need to lose weight. Why don’t we just have some lobster?
What’s wrong with you today? Why are you so angry?
Nothing. I’ll be fine after I have some lobster.

word.literal: regard men as superior to women
